alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 02 at 11:12AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Guam through 1145 AM CHST... At 1112 AM ChST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mangilao, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dededo, Tamuning, Yigo, Mangilao, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Barrigada, Yona, Hagatna Heights, Talofofo, Mongmong-Toto-Maite, Sinajana, Asan, Piti, Santa Rita and Umatac. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
